title: Pure
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of a chain of restaurants. Offers at least one vegan choice in each category such as soup, hot pot, salad and wrap or sandwich. All menu options clearly labelled with ingredients and can be found by menu icons. Also has gluten free and dairy free items.
